web-app:
HQ
contextConfigLocation
/WEB-INF/spring/security-web-context.xml, classpath*:/META-INF/spring/*-context.xml, classpath:META-INF/hqapi-context.xml
org.hyperic.hq.context.BootstrapContextLoaderListener
javax.servlet.jsp.jstl.fmt.localizationContext ApplicationResources
context-constants org.hyperic.hq.ui.Constants
service-locator com.hyperic.hq.ui.ServiceLocator
RtEnabled false
webapp org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet
contextConfigLocation /WEB-INF/spring/webapp-servlet-ee.xml
1
webapp /app/*
UrlRewriteFilter org.tuckey.web.filters.urlrewrite.UrlRewriteFilter
logLevel WARN
Hibernate-Session-Filter org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.OpenSessionInViewFilter
filterChainProxy org.springframework.web.filter.DelegatingFilterProxy
Resource-Filter org.hyperic.hq.ui.ResourceFilter
HQU-Filter org.hyperic.hq.ui.RenditFilter
httpMethodFilter org.springframework.web.filter.HiddenHttpMethodFilter
CharacterEncodingFilter org.hyperic.hq.web.filter.CharacterEncodingFilter
encoding UTF-8
forceEncoding true
excludePaths /ServerInvokerServlet,/transport/*
csrf org.hyperic.hq.web.filters.CsrfIgnoreAllGetsFilter
nonceCacheSize 100
csrf hqu metricdata availability availcolor navMapImage availHealthChart usageHealthChart utilizationHealthChart highLowChart metricChart availStoplight action ServletRedirector JspRedirector EnvironmentManagerInvoker *.jsp
UrlRewriteFilter /*
Hibernate-Session-Filter /*
filterChainProxy /*
CharacterEncodingFilter /*
httpMethodFilter webapp
Resource-Filter /images/*
Resource-Filter /css/*
Resource-Filter /js/*
HQU-Filter /hqu/*
com.hyperic.hq.ui.Configurator
hqu org.hyperic.hq.ui.servlet.RenditServlet 2
metricdata org.hyperic.hq.ui.servlet.MetricDataServlet 2
ServletRedirector org.apache.cactus.server.ServletTestRedirector
JspRedirector /jspRedirector.jsp
EnvironmentManagerInvoker /sas/EnvironmentManagerInvoker.jsp
availability org.hyperic.hq.ui.servlet.AvailabilityServlet 2
availcolor org.hyperic.hq.ui.servlet.AvailabilityColorServlet 2
navMapImage org.hyperic.hq.ui.servlet.NavMapImageServlet 2
availHealthChart org.hyperic.hq.ui.servlet.AvailHealthChartServlet 2

utilizationHealthChart org.hyperic.hq.ui.servlet.UtilizationHealthChartServlet 2

highLowChart org.hyperic.hq.ui.servlet.HighLowChartServlet 2
metricChart org.hyperic.hq.ui.servlet.MetricChartServlet 2
performanceChart com.hyperic.hq.ui.servlet.PerformanceChartServlet 2
availStoplight org.hyperic.hq.ui.servlet.AvailabilityStoplightChartServlet 2
action org.apache.struts.action.ActionServlet
config /WEB-INF/struts-config.xml,/WEB-INF/struts-config-ee.xml
debug 0
detail 0
validate true
mapping org.hyperic.hq.ui.action.BaseActionMapping

xls application/excel

ServerInvokerServlet Server Invoker Servlet The ServerInvokerServlet receives requests via HTTP protocol from within a web container and passes it onto the ServletServerInvoker for processing.
org.jboss.remoting.transport.servlet.web.ServerInvokerServlet
locatorUrl servlet://localhost:8000/unidirectional The servlet server invoker locator url

ServerInvokerServlet /transport/ServerInvokerServlet/*
